SELECT all_tab_columns.owner , all_tab_columns.table_name , all_tab_columns.column_name , all_tab_columns.data_type , all_tab_columns.data_length , all_tab_columns.nullable , all_tab_columns.column_id , all_tab_comments.comments AS table_comment , all_col_comments.comments AS column_comment FROM all_tab_columns LEFT OUTER JOIN all_tab_comments ON 1 = 1 AND all_tab_comments.owner = all_tab_columns.owner AND all_tab_comments.table_name = all_tab_columns.table_name LEFT OUTER JOIN all_col_comments ON 1 = 1 AND all_col_comments.owner = all_tab_columns.owner AND all_col_comments.table_name = all_tab_columns.table_name AND all_col_comments.column_name = all_tab_columns.column_name WHERE 1 = 1 AND all_tab_columns.owner = #owner#
